channel.title: Raspberrypi on tracing bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberrypi on tracing bytes

item.title: Raspberry Pi Web Server Using Caddy and Github Webhooks
item.description: After setting up the DMZ in my home network, it was time to get hands on with the actual server. I heard of a web server called Caddy, which is a HTTP/2 HTTPS-by-default web server written in Go. I got into Go as a programming language some time ago recently and I was a bit excited about a possibility of running a production capable web server with it on a Raspberry Pi.
